name: TAMASHII
description: An ancient entity seeking help, a Witch, an unnamed soul and a Twisted Temple. A dark tale about inner discoveries set in a distorted and perverted world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
